name: Assault Enemy Barrack 2019
description:
Assault Enemy Barrack 2019 is top fps shooting action based ultimate real sniper secret agent game for those who love fury sniper shooter FPS games. action game with challenging missions in special sniper war to show commando skills. Get ready to pull the trigger and eliminate the terrorists from the territory. Perform ultra-shooting combat skills as a fury elite sniper to show specialized sniper skills like a military assassin with thrilling and brutal sniper missions.
Features:
- Challenging missions
- Breathtaking realistic visuals
- Hard shooting missions
- Excellent artificial intelligence and real physics based game
- Efficient weapon controls & movement
- Stunning graphics and outstanding sound effects
- Perfect action fight simulation
- Thrilling missions that will amaze you.
